title: PROJECT Bundle Issues
body:
I bought myself the "First Strike Augment + Bundle" for 8220RP, I received everything that's listed here (http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/access-granted/gemstones) 
but I'm still missing:

- Recon Drone Ward
- PROJ Ashe Cache
- PROJ Ekko Cache 
- PROJ Kat Cache

Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body:
Hey there,

[This is a known issue and a fix was deployed, if you've still not received everything in the bundle then please wait it out as Riot are working hard to get them to everyone in the coming days.
](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/AEWspTEF-i-bought-the-project-bundle-and-i-didnt-get-the-ward-skin?comment=0007)

>UPDATE: The bundle has been fixed and re-activated. If you've purchased it and not received all the contents, we'll be working to get it all to you over the next couple of days.

>---------------------------------------------

>Hi everyone, deeply sorry about this.

>We're investigating what is causing these bonus items to fail. Rest assured that if you've purchased the First Strike Augment + Bundle and not received these bonus items (the PROJECT skin caches and Recon Drone Ward), you will receive them eventually.

>We'll try to keep you updated on when this is fixed and when to expect these items to be properly redeemed to your account.
how to get this announcement update? i still dont have the blueprints
